tests.summary: Verify Tod appears first in Services list with correct UI
tests.description: Ensure Tod is displayed as the first item with correct logo, design, and page scrollability.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the Services page
When the list of services loads
Then Tod must appear as the first service
   And the yellow Tod logo must be visible
   And the page must remain scrollable

tests.summary: Verify bundles page loads with cards and bundles
tests.description: Check that informational cards and all bundle types are visible with correct logos.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user taps the Tod service
When the bundles page loads
Then three informational cards must be visible
   And bundles Tod Mobile, Tod, and Tod 4K must appear
   And each bundle must show the correct Tod logo

tests.summary: Verify dynamic price updates based on duration
tests.description: Ensure 1, 3, and 12-month duration selections update bundle prices dynamically.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the Tod bundles page
When the user selects 1 month
Then the correct price must be displayed
When the user selects 3 months
Then the updated price must be displayed
When the user selects 12 months
Then the updated price must be displayed

tests.description: Ensure popup contains bundle name, duration, price, S’abonner button, close button, and dimmed background.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user selected a bundle and duration
When the user presses Purchase
Then a confirmation popup must appear
   And it must display the bundle name, duration, and price
   And it must contain a black Subscribe button and close button
   And the background must remain visible and dimmed

tests.description: Ensure the confirmation popup closes using either the X button or backdrop press.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the confirmation popup is visible
When the user taps the close button
Then the popup must close and return to the bundles page
When the user taps outside the popup
Then the popup must close and return to the bundles page

tests.summary: Verify insufficient funds screen appears for low balance
tests.description: Full-screen UI displayed when balance is lower than price with correct buttons and navigation.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user confirms the purchase
   And the user balance is lower than the required price
When the system checks balance
Then an insufficient funds full-screen must appear
   And it must contains red icon, title, message, black button (Recharge), white button (Retour) & Bottom slider visible

tests.summary: Verify Retour button returns to bundles page
tests.description: Retour button should navigate the user back to the bundles page.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the insufficient funds full-screen is displayed
When the user clicks Retour
Then the user returns to the bundles page

tests.summary: Verify recharge flow opens from insufficient funds page
tests.description: Recharge button should open the recharge process correctly.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the insufficient funds full-screen is displayed
When the user clicks Recharger
Then the recharge flow must start

tests.summary: Verify not eligible screen displays correctly
tests.description: Ensure full-screen not eligible UI appears with correct buttons and text when user is ineligible.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user confirms purchase
   And the user is not eligible for the service
When eligibility is checked
Then a full-screen not eligible page must appear
   And it must contains red icon, title, message, white button (Retour) & Bottom slider visible
   And pressing Retour must return the user to the bundles page

tests.summary: Verify processing state appears during activation
tests.description: Loading spinner and processing messages must be shown during transaction processing time.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user confirms the purchase
When the system starts processing activation
Then a loading spinner must appear
   And the processing messages must be displayed

tests.summary: Verify success screen appears after successful activation
tests.description: Full-screen success UI with green icon and navigation back to services page.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the purchase is successful
When the success screen appears
Then it must show green icon, title, and confirmation text
   And clicking D’accord buton must return the user to the services page

tests.summary: Verify navigation from bundles back to services
tests.description: User must be able to return back from bundles page to services page using back navigation.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the bundles page
When the user presses the system back button
Then the user must return to the services page

tests.summary: Verify repurchase restrictions for same bundle
tests.description: User cannot purchase same active bundle but can purchase different one.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user has an active Tod 4K subscription
When the user attempts to purchase Tod 4K again
Then the system must block the purchase
When the user selects Tod Mobile instead
Then the purchase must be allowed

tests.summary: Negative: API failure when loading bundles
tests.description: Simulate bundle listing API failure and verify error handling or fallback.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user selected Tod
When the bundles API fails to load
Then an appropriate error message must be shown
   And the page must not crash

tests.summary: Negative: Missing or incorrect pricing data
tests.description: Ensure UI handles missing or malformed pricing values gracefully.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the bundles page is loading
When the system receives invalid or missing pricing
Then a default or error state must be displayed
   And the Purchase button must be disabled

tests.summary: Negative: No internet connection during purchase
tests.description: Ensure error is shown when user loses connectivity before completing purchase.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the confirmation popup
When the user clicks S’abonner
   And the device is offline
Then a network error message must appear
   And the transaction must not proceed

tests.description: Ensure user cannot trigger purchase twice by fast double-clicking S’abonner button.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the confirmation popup is displayed
When the user taps S’abonner twice quickly
Then only one purchase request must be sent

tests.summary: Negative: Popup does not close properly
tests.description: Ensure system handles failure when popup close action fails unexpectedly.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the confirmation popup is visible
When the close action fails
Then an error must be logged
   And the user must remain on the same page without app crash
